Skill.label: Cast when Dmg Taken - Choose One

Skill.source: Item:42:Mark of the Shaper, Opal Ring
Item:42:Mark of the Shaper, Opal Ring

Spec.title: Lvl 32 - First Lab - Swap to EoW Mine
Lvl 40 - Socket for Poacher's Aim Jewel

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Start as a ^x7070FF^xE05030^xAF6025Templar^7^7^7
We Level using ^xD02090Sceptres^7 for Leap Slam
^xD02090REGEX FOR VENDORS^7:
b-b-g|b-g-b|g-b-b|b-b|r-g|g-r|nn|b-b-b
^xD02090Vendor Recipes:^7
You can Vendor an IRON Ring with any Blue gem to make a Sapphire Ring // any Green gem to make a Topaz Ring.
You will want to do this Recipe ^xD02090ONCE^7 by Level 8 (if possible) but for sure by lvl 12.
1x Orb of Alteration 1x BLUE Sceptre 1x WHITE Topaz Ring
You will want to do this Recipe ^xD02090TWICE^7 at Lvl 20 (not before). 1x Orb of Alteration 1x BLUE Sceptre 1x RARE Sapphire Ring (use an Essence to make Ring Rare)
^xD02090*** Kill all Bandits for this Build ***^7
^xAF6025Hillock:^7
Buy Stormblast Mines from Nessa
^xAF6025Hailrake:^7
Quest Reward: Onslaught (Nessa) & Frostbomb + Frostblink (Tarkleigh)
Buy Arcane Surge + Orb of Storms from Nessa
^xD02090Links:^7
Frostbomb + Onslaught (^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70G^7)
Stormblast Mines + Orb of Storms + Added Lightning Damage (lvl8) (^x7070FFBBB^7)
Frostblink + Arcane Surge (^x7070FFBB^7)
Leap Slam (lvl 10) (^xE05030R^7)
^xAF6025Chamber of Sins:^7
Herald of Ice + Herald of Thunder (^x7070FFB^7)(^x70FF70G^7)
^xAF6025Weaver's Chamber:^7
Leap Slam + Faster Attacks (^xE05030R^7^x70FF70G^7)
Frostbomb + Onslaught + Elemental Focus (^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7)
Stormblast Mines + Added Lightning Damage + Trap and Mine Damage (^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7)
Orb of Storm (^x7070FFB^7)
^xAF6025Maramoa (Act 3):^7
Conductivity (^x7070FFB^7)
^xAF6025Crystal Veins (Act 4):^7
^xD02090This is where you do Library to get Lvl 31 - After EoW Swap -> Go First Lab -> Sanctuary
^xFFFF77At this point, we need to go back and complete Library in Act 3^7
^xD02090Links after Library & Miner Swap:^7 Grab Arrogance as Quest Reward
Eye of Winter (Library) + Blastchain Mines (Act 1) + Swift Assembly (Library) + Charged Mines (4th Link - Library) (^x7070FFBBB^7^x70FF70G^7)
Frostbomb + Onslaught + Elemental Focus + Less Duration (4th Link - Library) (^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7^xE05030R^7)
Skitterbots (Library - Replace Herald of Thunder) + Herald of Ice + Clarity (Keep lvl 5 - Library) (^x7070FFB^7)(^x70FF70G^7)(^x7070FFB^7)
Leap Slam + Faster Attacks (^xE05030R^7^x70FF70G^7)
Frostblink + Arcane Surge (^x7070FFBB^7)
Sniper's Mark (Library) (^x70FF70G^7)
^xAF6025After Malachai:^7
Grab Arcanist Brand as Quest Reward from Lady Dialla (for later)
Arcanist Brand + Sniper's Mark + Flamewall (^x7070FFBB^7^x70FF70G^7)
^xD02090IMPORTANT:^7
Act 5 -> After The King's Feast -> Jewel Socket -> Poacher's Aim
Act 8 -> After 2nd Lab -> Arrogance + Vitality (^xE05030RR^7) Righteous Fire (^x7070FFB^7)
Drop Herald of Ice for Determination (^xE05030R^7)
